summary: The Saving Vet Halls Act of 2025 authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide grants to veterans service organizations. These grants are for facility and technology improvements, including repairs, rehabilitation, and technology upgrades. The bill outlines eligibility criteria, selection factors for grant recipients, grant limitations (including a maximum amount and frequency of grants), and authorizes $10,000,000 in appropriations for the program. The definition of a veterans service organization is also provided.
